result.reason: Quick Connect cannot currently override the default username, and supporting a user override is a well-scoped usability enhancement with clear demand.
result.approach: Add optional username parsing in Quick Connect input, apply it as a per-connect override on ConnectionInfo, and cover new and legacy input formats with tests.
